info.name: Calander API
info.description: Calendar-Based Class Scheduling System API - Supports one-time and recurring classes with flexible scheduling

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Introduction to Yoga",
  "description": "Beginner-friendly yoga session focusing on basic poses and breathing techniques.",
  "instructor": "Sarah Johnson",
  "location": "Room 101",
  "capacity": 20,
  "isRecurring": false,
  "scheduledDate": "2026-02-15T00:00:00.000Z",
  "startTime": "09:00",
  "endTime": "10:30"
}

{
  "title": "Updated Class Title",
  "description": "Updated description for the class.",
  "instructor": "New Instructor Name",
  "location": "New Location",
  "capacity": 35
}

item.name: Create Class - Invalid Time (End Before Start)
Create Recurring Class - Missing Recurrence Config
